column1: Taboão da Serra is a municipality in the state of São Paulo in Brazil. It is part of the Metropolitan Region of São Paulo. The population is 272
column2: 177 (2015 est.) in an area of 20.39 km². It is the second smallest city in area in the São Paulo Metropolitan Area (RMSP).
